HQarroum/microbox

Creates sandboxes for Linux with host isolation

View on index

Related repos

  • microsandbox: self-hosted platform for running untrusted code with isolation
  • Sandbox for containers that runs Linux system calls in userspace, sits between apps and the host kernel
  • deploy containers from local machine to self-hosted server
  • Standalone host for building MCP agents
  • Safely execute code snippets in containerized environments
  • Agent sandbox environment with browser, shell, and file access
  • runs lightweight microVMs for secure container and function workloads
  • Creates x86 and Arm virtual machines
  • micro front-end framework for building modular web apps
  • Run coding agents safely in a sandbox with built-in security, redaction, and full visibility
